page.title: 05Communications,Ecology
page.content:
{Communications} There is a Post office at Kirton general Stores. Open Mon-Fri 9.00 to 1645 sat 0900 to 1300. Postal collection times Kirton Post office are Mon-Fri 0900 and 1645, Sat 0900 There is an automatic telephone exchange at Kirton. There is a public Telephone box and Post Box at Falkenham .
{Ecology} Rabbits have made a come back recently but at present there is an outbreak of Myxomatosis so it is expected their numbers will deminish. Foxes are multiplying and grey squirrels are a pest. Some deer, including one muntjac, are sometimes seen. There has been a Ministry of Ag. campaign to reduce the number of coypu, some of which have been caught in residents gardens.
